Class NPCs

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.NPCs
Direct Known Subclasses:
PatrollingNPC
public class NPCs extends Entity
Child class of Entity, used to create NPCs in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • NPCs

      public NPCs(float x, float y, int width, int height, String name, LevelManager levelManager)
      Constructor for NPCs.
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of the NPC.
      y - y-coordinate of the NPC.
      width - Width of the NPC.
      height - Height of the NPC.
      levelManager - LevelManager object.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Method that updates everything related to the NPC.

    • updateMove

      protected void updateMove()
      Method that updates the movement of the NPC. If the NPC is not on the floor, it will keep falling until it reaches the floor. The NPC is set in Idle by default

    • newState

      protected void newState(int newState)
      Method that updates the NPC's state.
      Parameters:
      newState - New state of the NPC.

    • switchDirection

      public void switchDirection()
      Method that switches the direction the NPC is walking to.

    • directionSprites

      public void directionSprites()
      Method that changes the direction of the NPC's sprites.

    • inSight

      public boolean inSight()
      Method that checks if the player is in the NPC's field of view.
      Returns:
      True if the player is in the NPC's field of view, false otherwise.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics g)
      Method that renders the NPC on the screen.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics object.
